named-query.name: Book.findAllXML
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM Book b ORDER BY b.pages DESC

named-query.name: Book.findByTitleContainingXML
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM Book b WHERE b.title LIKE ?1

named-native-query.name: Book.findByIsbnNativeXML
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM book b WHERE b.isbn = :isbn
